basic_information.scholarship_name: Outstanding 2nd Year Graduate Student Award in International Relations

description: This scholarship is awarded to a Political Science major who exemplifies high academic achievement in their specific area of study and class standing. Eligibility Requirements Graduate student majoring in Political Science-International Relations Completion of 18 graduate hours or more Show strong academic performance (GPA)

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Political Science-Intnl Affair   or SIS_Major_2 is Political Sci-Intnl Relations   or SIS_Major is Political Science-Intnl Affair   or SIS_Major is Political Sci-Intnl Relations   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Political Science-Intnl Affair   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Political Sci-Intnl Relations   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Political Science-Intnl Affair   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Political Sci-Intnl Relations
